column4: do anyone else have problems with opera after the flashplugin got updated?
I was actually just about to ask about that
I've been having all kinds of problems with the flash player plugin, in general
guess i can redirecs the swf files to some other app, but thats not really a solution
does anyone know if the linux flash player is better than the macromedia one in terms of actually working?
I don't really care about features, as long as it plays stuff
i think i used that one before and it sucks
oh well, gota give it time then
do you know if there is any way to get the        old flash version trough apt?
I don't think you can, I think you'd have to find the installer binary somewhere and download it
I think we're having different problems though
I have trouble in general with the current version of the flash plugin, be it in firefox or opera
what kind of errors do you get if you run it in terminal?
